name: Blunt Objects - Wetried Games
description:
Your boss gave you a very simple task but you managed to mess it up. Would you be able to deliver the proper murder weapon?

Actions:
- Right click to grab or release an item.
- Use C to Crouch to better observe the weight value of the evidence.
- Use the Electroencefalomagic Lamp to detect possible murder evidence. It'll light when close to them, but you'll need some extra info to identify the item!

Remember to run through the door holding your evidence when you're sure. Because ... you are, right? You don't wanna get fired ...

Credits:

Xavi Bravo Guillén (Programmer)

Albert Val Vila (Programmer)

Andrea de la Cuesta Barceló (Artist)
